Name.value: White River Tools of Citizenship - Deschain's Revolver(Rebuilded)

Description.value: Collect all 8 books of the Dark Tower Series and craft 19 doors for the Tower. In exchange, receive Roland Deschain's Revolver and schematics to make matching gold and silver bullets.

Author.value: Shouden Kalferas and Aeyvi Kalferas(Rebuilded by 7DaystoDie.JP)
